featured.text: Welcome poles were traditionally placed on village beachfronts to greet visitors arriving by canoe.
They canoed down rivers, hiked along muddy trails, and climbed into the forest to explore and learn.

definition.zh_def: 一種輕便的水上交通工具，通常由一個或多個人划動。
definition.en_def: A lightweight watercraft that is typically propelled by paddling.
definition.example: We decided to go canoeing on the lake this weekend.
